name: Responsum
description:
Are you ready to feel emotion? Responsum is a story about feelings. Join Stella, the next guardian set on completing the Trials of Emotions. Through these trials, you must meet the guardians of emotions! Guide Stella as she draws her bow and shoots arrows that will save her world from the destructive forces of evil.

Capstone1, Term 3, AY 2016-2017 

Team members:
     • Zaira Burcer
     • Gadiel Lugre Delatado
     • Gino Diccion
     • Audrey Trigo
     • Joshua Mari Villena

Recognition:
     • Best CAPSTN1
     • Best in Gameplay (School Track) - GameOn! 2017
     • Best Narrative and Story nominee (School Track) - GameOn! 2017
